title: 209 -Self Doubt, ADHD and Breakthrough with Saiman Chow
description:
Today's episode is an interview with the brilliant mind that is Saiman Chow. I saw him give a talk at the ICON Illustration conference and my mind was seriously blown. I had to track him down and beg him to let me interview him.

Saiman's illustration and animation looks like a beautiful chaotic brain, forever in play.

This chat will inspire you to burst through self doubt and get lost in the play of your creative practice!

saimanchow.com
@chowsaiman

CREDITS

Thanks to Yoni Wolf and the band WHY? for our theme music.

Thanks to Alex Sugg for editing and the podcast!
www.alexsugg.com
